markdownRemark.html:
Location: Hochiminh city, Vietnam

Your role as the Junior/Mid-level Platform Engineer will be responsible for the implementation of tools and processes which enable rapid development and deployment of software. Your mission is to embrace continuous integration/deployment in a delivery pipeline that will perform automated quality checks, deploy cloud infrastructure and applications quickly, and provide operational tooling and metrics that can be consumed by development teams. To be successful, you will have a blend of development experience and operational experience that provides a good understanding of the developers you are working with, while also balancing critical systems uptime.

Responsibilities

  • Create a CI/CD pipeline for an automation work
  • Build/maintain a micro service
  • Monitor and respond to platform incidents, then troubleshoot and escalate if needed
  • Do software/system patching
  • Manage API Gateway (WSO2/AWS) & integration@edge (Nginx/Envoy) platform

Must Have

  • Have 2+ years as developers, preferably back-end engineers, in any of the following programming languages: Java / NodeJS / Python
  • Understand about Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) and engineering practices: code branching, code versioning, clean code principles, SOLID principles, …
  • Curious about new technology / framework
  • the ability to communicate effectively with business and technical teams

Nice to have

  • AWS certificates in any level (Practitioner / Associate / Professional)

Why You’ll Love Working Here

  • Salary review: 1 times/year
  • 13-month bonus program
  • People focus workplace: healthy environment, encourage positive differences and innovation
  • Company Trip once a year
  • All insurances according to Vietnamese Labor law

Please email your resume to Datum Career for positions in Vietnam, indicating the role you are applying for in the subject line.
